group_1.narration: Today is the day@I promised to meet up with Madoka...!

group_1.textRight: Kako, look look!@There's a special Halloween menu.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, you're right, there really is!
Which one should I try...@Pumpkin Anmitsu sounds good...

group_1.textRight: [chara:200101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]This pumpkin pudding has bats riding on it,@how cute~!
Just looking at Halloween stuff is making me@excited!
The seasonal decorations and limited-time menus@in stores...
And the annual costume event is fun too, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... that's right...
(The costume event, huh...)

group_1.narration: The Shopping District's Halloween Event.@I decided to participate this year,@but I can't seem to decide what costume to wear...

group_1.textRight: Kako, do you dislike Halloween...?
Maybe you're not good with ghosts...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yeah, I'm definitely not good with ghosts, but...
I do enjoy Halloween.
I'll be participating in the Shopping District's@Halloween Event this year.

group_1.textRight: The Halloween Event?!@So are you going to dress up?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
But I still haven't decided on what costume@to wear...

group_1.textRight: ...Are you worried about something?

group_1.textLeft: ...I want to help raise the Shopping District's@popularity so more customers come.
If I liven up the area at Halloween, the place should@get more crowded...
So I've decided to participate in the special event.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: But I don't know what to wear to help make@the event fun for everyone.
The more I think about it, the more confused I get...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Kako.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...?

group_1.textRight: Wanting to wear a costume that will make@everyone smile...
You're so kindhearted, I think that's really nice.
But...
Won't it be better to find a costume that makes@you smile and say "I want to wear this!"?
To entertain everyone in the Shopping District and@make them smile...
First of all, don't you need to be having fun?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... That's true...

group_1.textRight: The first step in bringing happiness to others is...
"Find what you enjoy!"@You know?
You should wear the costume you like the most!
...Just kidding.
I'm here giving advice, but really I'm in the@same boat.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...

group_1.textRight: I haven't decided on a Halloween costume either~...

group_1.textLeft: ...In that case...
...Madoka, would you like to figure it out with me?

group_1.textRight: [chara:200101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?

group_1.textLeft: I want to figure out costumes we can both enjoy!

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah! Let's do this together!

group_1.narration: I dressed up for Halloween@and took a commemorative photo with Natsuki.@I sent Madoka the photo in a message as a thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, it's from Kako!
(Halloween... How did it go, I wonder?@Were you able to enjoy it...?)
Huh? This...
This girl... her costume's a perfect match@with yours...

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah! Since we prepared and made them@together.
This girl is wearing your costume too...?

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh!
To enjoy Halloween, we prepared and made them@together.
That costume...looks great on your friend,@doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Your friend looks really cute in hers too...!

group_1.narration: Thanks to Madoka,@I was able to enjoy@Halloween in the shopping district.@Madoka, really, thank you so very much!
